name: Tower of Avarice
description: Hello guys.  I recently started learning unity and english, so i hope you understand my "perfect" english here and in game :D This is a simple game about a tower crammed with traps, on top of which lies something intresting. Or not. The game really does not want to be done. This my first experience in unity and i spent 120 hours for create this game. Game can be completed in 4 minutes without deaths, but my 14 year old brother died in the game 387 times to complete the game!!!  Since the game is very short, I decided to show two screenshots just so that you could see who to play against, against whom and in general where. I hope anyone can done this game too and give me rage feedback how long he tried to do it. (:
